name: Lothric Knight Sword
description: A straight sword used by Lothric Knights, known for precision and thrusting attacks, making it reliable in combat.

name: Black Knight Greataxe
description: A mighty greataxe wielded by Black Knights, forged in flames. Delivers powerful, crushing blows capable of breaking defenses.
gameAppear: Dark Souls I, Dark Souls III

name: Onikiri and Ubadachi
description: Onikiri and Ubadachi are twin katanas, with a nice lightweight and elegant structure, designed for fast, agile, and precise attacks.

name: Dragon Slayer Spear
description: Weapon wielded by Ornstein, infused with lightning. Known for its ability to pierce through enemies with precise thrusts.
gameAppear: Dark Souls I, Dark Souls III

name: Fume Ultra Greatsword
description: Ultra greatsword wielded by Tsorig, extremely heavy. Requires a lot of strength but delivers devastating strikes.

name: Ring of Favor
description: A ring that boosts HP, stamina, and maximum equip load. A symbol of favor and protection.
requirements_effects: Increases HP, Stamina, and Equip Load
gameAppear: Dark Souls I, Dark Souls III

name: Havel's Ring
description: A ring that greatly increases maximum equip load. Belonged to Havel the Rock, massive strength and endurance.
gameAppear: Dark Souls I, Dark Souls III

name: Chloranthy Ring
description: A ring associated with the Green Blossom. Increases stamina recovery speed.
gameAppear: Dark Souls I, Dark Souls III

name: Estus Ring
description: A ring that increases the amount of HP restored by Estus flasks.

name: Ring of the Evil Eye
description: A ring that allows you to regain HP with each enemy defeated, aiding in survival during battle.
gameAppear: Dark Souls I, Dark Souls III

name: Darkmoon Seance Ring
description: A ring tied to the Darkmoon covenant, allowing you to access the Darkmoon Tomb and certain secrets.

name: Sellsword Twinblades
description: Twin blades known for their fast and effective slashing attacks, often wielded by agile fighters.

name: Great Club
description: A large club that delivers massive damage with powerful, slow swings that crush opponents effectively.
gameAppear: Dark Souls I, Dark Souls III

name: Washing Pole
description: A katana known for its long reach and ability to deal swift, precise strikes at range.

name: Star of the morning
description: A weapon known for its medium reach and ability to deal blood damage, precise strikes at range short.
